page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: From the 20 people questioned,the following results have been formed into percentages. 11% work in Primary industry,33% in Manfacturing industry and 49% in Service industry.27% work in our area the rest working outside.The following list indicates distances travelled to work.-1mile 16%,1-5m 0%,5-10m 33%. 10-20m 22%,20-50m 0%,variable 16%.66% of people travel to work by car,5% by van and 5% walk. 100% of people enjoy their work.66% hold specialist qualifications.16% of people have worked for 1-2years,2-5y 0%,5-10y 27%,10-20y 33%,20-30y 5%, 30-40y 0%. Some of the main employers in our area Ranks Xerox at Mitcheldean and Woodville Polymer at Ross. Surprisingly 27% of people are self employed.
